titles.title: Medicare Mental Health Inpatient Equity Act
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 190-day lifetime limit on inpatient psychiatric hospital services under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/15/2010--Introduced. Medicare Mental Health Inpatient Equity Act - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 190-day lifetime limit on inpatient psychiatric hospital services.
